Featured Projects

Computer Vision Algorithm
  • Java
  • OpenCV
  • Android Studio

    • As part of FIRST® Robotics Team 174, I helped develop a vision targetting algorithm. This algorithm was created using Java and OpenCV to detect retroreflective tape. The algorithm implemented in a custom android application, which sent the information to the robot. The robot contained an algorithm to then autonomously guide the robot to the target.
